ygData.subject: Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: I have only made about three trips to Kunark now.  The first two were just a disaster but this third trip was great.  I manage to hit level 17 and screamed
ygData.messageBody:
I have only made about three trips to Kunark now. The first two were just a
disaster but this third trip was great. I manage to hit level 17 and
screamed back to FV to train dual wield. After a bit of looking around I
asked if there was a bard trainer. Nope :( I had to go back to the main
land to train - which I did... I have been wanting dual wield for days......
Just curious - are bards the only guild that do not have a trainer there? I
saw many other trainers along the way and even someone to sell songs....

Just wanted to say I love Kunark! I have been grouped in Lake of Ill Omen
and loved it. It's a harsh place but once you get settled in you don't want
to leave - half the reason I am miffed as to there being no trainer
there....

Jacana, Wood Elf Bard of the 17th song, Innoruuk


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
